Body:
"""Test get_storagegroup_snapshot_list."""
snapshot_info, sg_name = self.create_sg_snapshot()
self.replication.create_storagegroup_snap(sg_name, 'ci_snap', ttl=1, hours=True
    )
snapshot_info = self.replication.get_storagegroup_snapshot_list(sg_name)
self.assertIn('ci_snap', snapshot_info)
self.replication.delete_storagegroup_snapshot(sg_name, snap_name='ci_snap',
    gen_num=0)
